Accounts.Description: Get a list of accounts for a specific owner or a specific member.

Audit.Description: Get all auditable actions filterable by area.
Return all Audit Streams scoped to an organization
Return Audit Stream with id of streamId if one exists otherwise throw

Build.Description: Associates an artifact with a build.
Gets a specific artifact for a build.
Gets a file from the build.
Gets all artifacts for a build.
Gets a specific attachment.
Gets the list of attachments of a specific type that are associated with a build.
This endpoint is deprecated. Please see the Build Status REST endpoint.
Gets a badge that indicates the status of the most recent build for the specified branch.
Deletes a build.
Gets a build.
Gets the changes associated with a build
Gets an individual log file for a build.
Gets the logs for a build.

Build.Operation: Builds - Get Build Work Items Refs
Build.Description: Gets the work items associated with a build.

Build.Operation: Builds - Get Build Work Items Refs From Commits
Build.Description: Gets the work items associated with a build, filtered to specific commits.
Gets the changes made to the repository between two given builds.

Build.Operation: Builds - Get Work Items Between Builds
Build.Description: Gets all the work items between two builds.
Gets a list of builds.
Queues a build
Updates a build.
Updates multiple builds.
Gets a controller
Gets controller, optionally filtered by name
Creates a new definition.
Deletes a definition and all associated builds.
Gets a definition, returns the latest revision.
Gets all revisions of a definition.
Gets a list of definitions.
Restores a deleted definition

Updates an existing build definition. In order for this operation to succeed, the value of the 'Revision' property of the request body must match the existing build definition's. It is recommended that you obtain the existing build definition by using GET, modify the build definition as necessary, and then submit the modified definition with PUT.
Creates a new folder.
Deletes a definition folder. Definitions and their corresponding builds will also be deleted.
Gets a list of build definition folders.
Updates an existing folder at given existing path
Gets pipeline general settings.
Updates pipeline general settings.

Returns the retention history for the project collection. This includes pipelines that have custom retention rules that may prevent the retention job from cleaning them up, runs per pipeline with retention type, files associated with pipelines owned by the collection with retention type, and the number of files per pipeline.
Gets the latest build for a definition, optionally scoped to a specific branch.
Adds new leases for pipeline runs.
Removes specific retention leases.
Returns the details of the retention lease given a lease id.

Build.Operation: Leases - Get Retention Leases By Minimal Retention Leases
Build.Description: Returns any leases matching the specified MinimalRetentionLeases

Build.Operation: Leases - Get Retention Leases By Owner Id
Build.Description: Returns any leases owned by the specified entity, optionally scoped to a single pipeline definition and run.

Build.Operation: Leases - Get Retention Leases By User Id
Build.Description: Returns any leases owned by the specified user, optionally scoped to a single pipeline definition and run.
Gets build metrics for a definition.
Gets build metrics for a project.

Gets a list of branches for the given source code repository.
Gets a list of source code repositories.
Gets a list of webhooks installed in the given source code repository.
Recreates the webhooks for the specified triggers in the given source code repository.
Update a build stage

Gets the build status for a definition, optionally scoped to a specific branch, stage, job, and configuration.  If there are more than one, then it is required to pass in a stageName value when specifying a jobName, and the same rule then applies for both if passing a configuration parameter.
Adds a tag to a build.
Adds tags to a build.

Adds multiple tags to a definition.

Removes a tag from a definition.

Iterations.Description: Get a team's iterations using timeframe filter
Add an iteration to the team.

Member Entitlement Management.Description: Delete a user from the account.  The delete operation includes unassigning Extensions and Licenses and removing the user from all project memberships. The user would continue to have access to the account if she is member of an AAD group, that is added directly to the account.
Get the group entitlements for an account.
Get direct members of a Group.
Get User Entitlement for a user.
Get a paged set of user entitlements matching the filter criteria. If no filter is is passed, a page from all the account users is returned.

Permissions Report.Description: Request a permissions report to be created asyncronously
Get a list of permissions reports.

Personal Access Tokens.Description: Lists of all the session token details of the personal access tokens (PATs) for a particular user.

Projects.Description: Get project with the specified id or name, optionally including capabilities.
Get all projects in the organization that the authenticated user has access to.
